name: Weapon Specialization

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Proficiency with selected weapon, Weapon Focus with selected weapon, fighter level 4th.

sections.body: You gain a +2 bonus on all damage rolls you make using the selected weapon.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a new type of weapon.
sections.name: Special

description: You are skilled at dealing damage with one weapon. Choose one type of weapon (including unarmed strike or grapple) for which you have already selected the Weapon Focus feat. You deal extra damage when using this weapon.
